hero.title: Navigate Your Health Journey with Confidence
hero.subtitle: FlowCare routes you to the most appropriate care setting based on your symptoms, wait times, facility capabilities and your preferences.

valueProps.title: Reduce unnecessary ED visits
valueProps.description: FlowCare helps patients avoid long waits by directing them to the right care level.

valueProps.title: Smart routing using demo data
valueProps.description: We leverage your symptoms, demo wait time estimates, facility capabilities and your preferences to recommend care.

valueProps.title: Improve experience & system efficiency
valueProps.description: Our platform empowers patients and reduces strain on emergency departments.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
steps: Create your profile and set your preferences.
FlowCare analyzes demo wait times and facility capabilities.
We recommend the best care setting and rank nearby facilities.
You review results, view maps and directions, and choose your care.

operationalConcept.title: Operational Concept
operationalConcept.description: This MVP uses a demo dataset for presentation purposes. In production, FlowCare would integrate real-time facility feeds and partner data to provide accurate wait times and capabilities, adhering to governance and compliance frameworks.

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.description: We do not require an account. Your profile and triage inputs are stored only on your device. This is a demo; please do not enter sensitive personal information.
